name: Blink
effects: Teleport 4m distance
description: Harness mystical energy to teleport forward a short distance, even passing through enemies to evade or position strategically.

name: Channel
effects: Charge this spell to draw in sacred energy, sacrificing health to gain focus and amplify your mystical power.
description: Charge this spell to draw in sacred energy, sacrificing health to gain focus and amplify your mystical power.

name: Cold Enchantment
effects: Infuse your weapon with the essence of cold, chilling foes with frosty strikes that slow their advance.
description: Infuse your weapon with the essence of cold, chilling foes with frosty strikes that slow their advance.

name: Cold Resistance
effects: + 25% Ice Resistance for 120 seconds
description: Fortify yourself against cold-based attacks, reducing ice damage and increasing your resilience to freezing effects.

name: Damage Surge
effects: + 20% Overall Damage Dealt for 120 seconds
description: Temporarily boost your Attack, unleashing a surge of strength that increases your damage output for 120s.

name: Electric Enchantment
effects: Charge your weapon with electric power, electrifying each strike to shock and stun your adversaries.
description: Charge your weapon with electric power, electrifying each strike to shock and stun your adversaries.

name: Electric Resistance
effects: + 25% Lightning Resistance for 120 seconds
description: Enhance your defenses against lightning-bases attacks, reducing lightning damage and preventing shock status.

name: Focus Halo
effects: + 100 Focus for 120 seconds
description: Elevate your Focus, enhancing your Cerim abilities by increasing your maximum focus points for 120s.

name: Heal
effects: Spend focus to restore your health, calling on inner power to recover from wounds.
description: Spend focus to restore your health, calling on inner power to recover from wounds.

name: Heal Aura
effects: Charge this spell to convert focus into health, surrounding yourself with a restorative aura that heals you over time.
description: Charge this spell to convert focus into health, surrounding yourself with a restorative aura that heals you over time.

name: Heat Enchantment
effects: Imbue your weapon with fiery energy, igniting your strikes to scorch enemies and set the battlefield ablaze.
description: Imbue your weapon with fiery energy, igniting your strikes to scorch enemies and set the battlefield ablaze.

name: Heat Resistance
effects: + 25% Fire Resistance for 120 seconds
description: Gain resistance to heat-based attacks, reducing fire damage and improving your survival against fiery blows.

name: Illuminate
effects: Summon a radiant light that follows you, illuminating dark areas and revealing hidden paths.
description: Summon a radiant light that follows you, illuminating dark areas and revealing hidden paths.

name: Plague Enchantment
effects: Coat your weapon with a virulent plague, enhancing its strikes to rapidly build up plague damage.
description: Coat your weapon with a virulent plague, enhancing its strikes to rapidly build up plague damage.

name: Plague Resistance
effects: + 25% Plague Resistance for 120 seconds
description: Build up immunity to plague-based attacks, reducing toxin damage and mitigating poison effects.

name: Poise Shield
effects: + 200% Poise for 120 seconds
description: Bolster your Poise, increasing your stability and resistance to being staggered by enemy attacks for 120s.

name: Pulse of Health
effects: + 20% Health for 120 seconds
description: Restore your Health and increase your maximum health for 120s, ensuring you can withstand more damage in battle.

name: Repair
effects: Channel sacred energy to repair and restore durability to your equipped items, ensuring they remain battle-ready.
description: Channel sacred energy to repair and restore durability to your equipped items, ensuring they remain battle-ready.

name: Return
effects: Fast Travel to any unlocked whisper of your choice.
description: Fast Travel to any unlocked whisper of your choice.

name: Scream
effects: Let out a powerful scream that knocks down enemies in front of you, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.
description: Let out a powerful scream that knocks down enemies in front of you, leaving them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.

name: Stamina Wellspring
effects: + 30% Stamina for 120 seconds
description: Tap into a wellspring of energy, increasing your Stamina and enabling you to perform more actions for 120s.

name: Thorns
effects: + 80% Thorns for 120 seconds
description: Channel sacred energy to get a mark of protection, reflecting damage back to enemies who strike you.
